title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Three-panel huipil; side panels are of store-bought fabric; central pattern is predominantly red, weft faced ground, with many rows of patterning in yellow, orange, green and white. Patterns include birds, animals, triangular shapes and \"psuedo-chevrons.\" Neckline is round-cut, surrounded by appliqu√©d and embroidered circle and loops.
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
